name: Window Explorers
description:
Window Explorers is a prototype.

It's a game where the window(s) move on the screen and you have to explore randomly generated levels.

It's a single or multiplayer game with no goal (you can try to find an objective on the map). The game will work better if your screen resolution is 1920*1080 (or higher).

If you want to use multiplayer :

- The host chooses the keys with letters (WASD or ZQSD, depending on your OS language).

- The one who joins chooses the keys with arrows.

To play on the same computer, launch the game twice (or more), click on "Localhost" after choosing the arrow keys. If you want to play online, you have to enter the IP and port of the host (switch between both with the Tab key).

To play singleplayer, use the keys with letters.

 The game uses networking to link the two (or more) instances, even on the same computer.
